seed_pair.known: Do you want me to help you look for it?
Yes that would be very helpful.

seed_pair.target: No gracias, puedo manejarlo por mi cuenta.
seed_pair.known: No thank you I can manage on my own.
Can you understand what I'm saying?

seed_pair.target: ¿Qué quieres hacer el domingo por la mañana?
seed_pair.known: What do you want to do on Sunday morning?

seed_pair.target: Le preguntaré si podrá ayudar el año próximo.
seed_pair.known: I'll ask him if he'll be able to help next year.
I'll ask her where she wants to go.

seed_pair.target: No tuve tiempo, aunque quería verte.
seed_pair.known: I didn't have time, although I wanted to see you.

seed_pair.target: ¿Qué vas a hacer el domingo por la tarde?
seed_pair.known: What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?

seed_pair.target: Me gustaría leer mi libro por un rato.
seed_pair.known: I'd like to read my book for a while.
